text: Florinel Cristi Mirea (born 13 July 1974 in Craiova) is a former Romanian football player. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Sportspeople from Craiova Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:FC Zimbru Chișinău players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Moldova Category:FC Spartak Vladikavkaz players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:FC U Craiova 1948 players Category:FC Stal Alchevsk players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Ukraine Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Ukraine Category:Association football defenders
title: Florinel Mirea
